title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2023
content:
8th September, 2023 Statutory Instruments 267
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 40 OF 2023
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2023
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in Section 125 of The
Electoral Process Act, 2016, the following order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
Order, 2023.
2. A Candidate for election as a Councillor in a district and Date and
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the time of
nomination
Returning Officer on Thursday, 7th September, 2023, between 0900
for election
hours and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Friday, 8th Campaign
September, 2023 at 1400 hours and close at 1800 hours on period
Wednesday, 11th October, 2023.
4. (1) A poll for the election of Councilor in a district and Election date
ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Thursday, 12th and time of
poll
October, 2023 between 0600 hours and 1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district and ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00 each.
268 Statutory Instruments 8th September, 2023
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs 2 and 4)
ELECTION FOR COUNCILLORS
LOCATION
District Constituency Ward No. Name
Kalabo Liuwa 000110001019 Upangoma
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this 30th day of
August, 2023
M.F. ZALOUMIS,
Chairperson
AMB. D. SIMWINGA,
Vice chairperson
V.M. MUKANDA,
Member
N.M. MUTITI,
Member
C. CHIPENZI,
Member
LUSAKA
30th August,2023
[EC.101/5/5/CONF.]
